English: After A Certain Time Shield Is Generated And The Protective Barrier Duration, The Scope Of Lightning Properties Is Damaged Around.

English: Create A Buff That Causes The Scope Of Lightning Properties And Adds To The General Attack To Add Lightning Attribute Damage
